name: Ayush Sharma
profession: Data Science Student | Machine Learning Engineer

Experienced in building predictive models, performing advanced analytics, and deploying scalable machine learning solutions. Strong foundation in EDA, model evaluation, and feature engineering. Enthusiastic about solving real-world problems using ethical, efficient, and explainable AI.

education.desc: Specialized in ethical hacking, cryptography, and secure software engineering.
